page.title: 10HOUSING AROUND AUDENSHAW(2)
page.content: There is old peoples' sheltered {bungalow}accommodation close to the council estate. Three small streets with{terraced houses with back yards compose the {terraced}type of dwellings but these have a dense red brick facia which gives them a superior look to the normal type of common brick found outside this area. These three streets are located close to what was once a large engineering works which has been demolished. Audenshaw is sandwiched between two main roads in which shops are located. A small shopping precinct including a post office supplies some of the requirements of local shoppers.
